name: SANKALP

address: Plot 54, Sagar Society, Road No 2, Banjara Hills,

briefDescription: Sankalp- for a good cause, is a registered body under the Societies Registration Act, 1860. It is also a CSR initiative by the staff of Sathguru Management Consultants, where a group of like-minded colleagues from all the divisions join together to support some specific philanthropic goals. Education of underprivileged girl children, healthcare for the elderly, skill building and some more community-centric activities sum up this philanthropic initiative to reach out and make a difference to the society. Sankalp project are categorized under Siksha, Jiva and Vivrithi.
